ygData.subject: RE: Gnoll Slayer Sword
ygData.msgSnippet: Aaaaahhhhh...never noticed...alhtough I haven t fought reavers since like 18th level, and i m 34 now. Thanks for the info...I wonder if the Skull of J hen Tra
ygData.messageBody:
Aaaaahhhhh...never noticed...alhtough I haven't fought reavers since like
18th level, and i'm 34 now. Thanks for the info...I wonder if the Skull of
J'hen Tra is that this guy is lookin for? Doubt it, but it's the only item
of worth I've ever gotten off these gnolls. A book and an eye...any clues on
this? There any named white gnolls out there in EK or Lake Rathe?

-----Original Message-----
From: Igor David Schneider [mailto:ids@...]
Sent: Friday, September 24, 1999 1:50 PM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] Gnoll Slayer Sword


From: "Igor David Schneider" <ids@...>



Was wondering if anyone has completed this quest, or knows where the White
One Eyed gnolls are? The white gnolls I know of are in Lake Rathe, the
Embalmers at night, and the Undead Reavers in NK. I don't think they have
one eye though...

Any clues?

Well the Gnol Reavers in EK and the Exhumed Gnolls in Lake Rathe do only
have one eye. If you look at their faces one is is poached.
